description:
Sublight COM2 rounds travel the last meter or so at <good>very high speeds</good> through <info>'Centre Of Mass Displacement'</info> technology. Recorded speeds of the 127mm COM2 rounds are close to 100,000 meters per second. Enough to leave a big hole in just about anything. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle and some LEDs on the barrel sides, all placed on top of a black structure.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
